item.description: August can be a busy summer month for fitting vacations and family get-togethers around a busy work schedule. The hot weather can make it hard to find time for exercising your pet . Did you know that this month we celebrate National Best Friend Day?! It's time to suprise our faithful four legged Best Friends with a little fun & TLC! We'll bring the splashy pool out for them to dunk in & have plenty of toys to play fetch & tug of war! Hope to see you all Sunday August 21st from 1pm-3pm. Proof of current vaccinations required: Rabies, DHLPP, Boardatella
item.name: Celebrate National Best Friend Day!
